Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.HAT:
● You can't banish "Djinn Releaser of Rituals" when resolving this card.
● This card can Ritual Summon any Ritual Monster.
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, the sent monsters are banished, and you still Ritual Summon.
● The monsters sent count towards the number of monsters "used" for that Ritual Summon.

● You choose the Ritual Monster you want to Ritual Summon when the effect resolves.

Rulings.Base: 1. This effect does not target anything.\n2. You choose the Ritual Monster you want to Ritual Summon when the effect resolves.

PSCT.Tengu: ① Send any number of Normal Monsters from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, whose Level exactly equals their combined Levels.
